level.heading: Reporting.
level.text: Beginning on January 1, 2011, and every 6 months thereafter, the Mayor shall provide the following information, delineated by month, to the Council, the:
Number of households participating in the District's cash assistance TANF programs;
Number of households participating in SNAP;
Number of homeless households participating in SNAP;
Number of households who left the District's cash assistance TANF programs, including the reasons they left;
Number of households who left SNAP, including the reasons they left; and
Number of SNAP participants who are self-employed.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 5084 of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 18-223, see notes following ยง 4-261.21.
